name: My-very-frist-webpage
tagline: First webpage, created from what I learned through Codecademy's HTML & CSS course.
body:
Hi! I'm a baby developer

My name is Jen - yeah that's a good start

I am making this page because I realised that I was just going through the motions on Codecadmey, but would quickly forget the syntax, and anything else I had learned.
Best thing to do? Rather than just following the very the prescriptive tasks, I wanted to use what I had learned to create something which was at least vaguely meaningful for me.

Hmm...what else do you need to know?
Apparently I like tiny cats and huge glasses of wine:

Anyway, where am I so far?

Codecademy courses
Course Percentage completed
HTML and CSS 40%
Javascript 45%
Java 29%
Python 83%

I should probably stop jumping around and actually finish one of these courses, huh?
Well, that's going to be this one! HTML & CSS


Contact me if you like
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
